Description:
This method detects mimikatz keywords in different Eventlogs (some of them only appear in older Mimikatz version that are however still used by different threat groups)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), David ANDRE (additional keywords)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Mimikatz Use
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((log like '%dpapi::masterkey%' or log like '%eo.oe.kiwi%' or log like '%event::clear%' or log like '%event::drop%' or log like '%gentilkiwi.com%' or log like '%kerberos::golden%' or log like '%kerberos::ptc%' or log like '%kerberos::ptt%' or log like '%kerberos::tgt%' or log like '%kiwi legit printer%' or log like '%lsadump::%' or log like '%mimidrv.sys%' or log like '%\mimilib.dll%' or log like '%misc::printnightmare%' or log like '%misc::shadowcopies%' or log like '%misc::skeleton%' or log like '%privilege::backup%' or log like '%privilege::debug%' or log like '%privilege::driver%' or log like '%sekurlsa::%') and  not eventid = '15')
